article_text:
Sunbury, PA (17801)

Today

More clouds than sun. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High 86F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph..

Tonight

Considerable cloudiness. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 62F. Winds light and variable.

og.description: LEWISBURG — The guest presenter at Tuesday night’s Charles P. Fasano Memorial Lecture has a prescription for success in the nation’s ever changing health care system. “Localize,” said Dr. David
og.title: Look at medicine differently
